title: Southpaw relation definitions
description: A JSON doc that describes the relationship tree for the entities that make up each denormalized entity

DenormalizedName.description: The name of the denormalized object created (e.g. feed), should be null if this is a child relation

Entity.description: The (short) name of the entity (e.g. media)

JoinKey.description: The name of the key field used to join to the parent of this entity (ON JoinKey = ParentKey), should be null if this is the root relation

ParentKey.description: The name of the key field of the parent used to join to this entity (ON JoinKey = ParentKey), should be null if this is the root relation

Children.description: The child entities of this entity
